attributes.action: Reinstate capital punishment for serial killers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When England had the death penalty there was a deterrent. People knew if they killed a person and they were caught they may be hung. 

Capital Punishment is not against human rights, the United States of America has the death penalty and justice is served to those who deserve it.

People who kill other people who are sane of mind deserve the worst of punishments.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
